title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'Web Application Developer

About Us

Torrance Job Description:

Phyn is changing the way people think about water. In just nine years nearly two in three people may face a shortage of clean water. Yet in the U.S alone, people unknowingly waste a trillion gallons of water per year, largely because it\xe2\x80\x99s an invisible problem that is hidden behind the walls, underground, or simply ignored. But what if it could become more visible? We believe that creating the tools to bring issues to light before they start is the key to saving water, saving money and, just maybe, saving the planet.

Phyn is the result of nearly a decade of research, development, and testing. We are currently searching for a Web Developer to accelerate our successful post launch plans. You will be a critical member of a small, customer focused, engineering team for our React JS and React Native Web, iPhone and Android applications. This isn\xe2\x80\x99t an average position where you might be restricted to one small piece of the company\xe2\x80\x99s technology, but one where you\xe2\x80\x99ll have influence over our whole web and mobile program, from design to production. If you want to work on products that will have an impact on solving a major global issue with tremendous growth opportunity, this is the opportunity to consider.

The successful candidate has sufficient experience and expertise to imaginatively address tasks/assignments of a medium to complex level. Structures and manages the execution of project/program tasks with little guidance and supervision and recommends and executes new approaches. Assignments will require technical analysis and inventive design recommendations for cost effective resolutions of problems. Coordinates across functional groups to ensure all tasks and input are received. Leads technical support staff in testing and analysis. Contributes ideas and/or concepts that support the generation of intellectual property. The successful candidate takes initiative and demonstrates self-motivation and enthusiasm to solve problems.

What We Want You To Do
Develop browser based responsive dynamic web applications.
Experienced with React JS, Redux and Node.js frameworks.
Expert level understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
Experience working with UX Design Tools such as Invision.
Work with UX Team and produce excellent UI confirming to UX requirements.
Familiarity with mobile application development using React Native for iOS and Android.
Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.
Integrate with our backend services to make sure we are delivering a great web and mobile user experience that\xe2\x80\x99s super-fast for end users.
Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and have the chance to contribute innovative and original ideas to our technology, algorithms and product.
Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results within a schedule.


Who You Are

You want to work on challenging problems with smart people. You\xe2\x80\x99re someone who could get positions at most software companies, but you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for the perfect role that has great leadership, a roster of top talent, game-changing product vision, and a work hard/play hard company culture.

You also meet most (if not all) of the following requirements:
Requires a bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or any other technical discipline with equivalent experience.
Employees entering this job typically have 5 or more years of directly related experience in web application development with a demonstrated record of leadership designing and shipping products/features.
Personal commitment to continuously learn and improve.
5 to 7 years of recent hands-on software design and coding experience.
A track record of projects completed on time \xe2\x80\x93 you are a flawless executor and know how to build great software.
Evidence of being self-motivated and driven \xe2\x80\x93 you find satisfaction in a job well done and want to solve hard problems.
Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.


Experience With WordPress Preferred

What you\xe2\x80\x99re getting into

We\xe2\x80\x99ve got big collaborative spaces for your big ideas, so bring an open mind and leave your suit in the closet. We all are committed to creating unique and rewarding consumer experiences. Everyone is interested in succeeding \xe2\x80\x93 for the team, for themselves and for the business. Cross-functionally and across the company, everyone has common goals and aspires to be their best.

You will learn something new or at least look at things differently every day. There are so many smart and creative people around that you\xe2\x80\x99ll be motivated to pursue the ideal.

Team spirit is infectious. Belkin is an extremely open workplace, where communication is essential. Not every idea will be accepted, but you\xe2\x80\x99ll be asked for your point of view. Innovation thrives on multiple and varied levels. At Belkin we challenge conventional wisdom and refuse to accept that something cannot be done.

We are committed to diversity. Belkin is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace.

All candidates applying for a job in the EMEA region, please review the Applicant Privacy notice HERE
Location: Torrance, California

Posted 14 Days Ago Full time 10008978

At Belkin International, people come first. Without question, the single greatest contributing factor to our nearly 30 years of success is our talented and ambitious staff. We\xe2\x80\x99ve found that by creating an inspirational, supportive and enriching environment, we thrive.

Around here, it\xe2\x80\x99s not about fancy titles, strong political positioning skills, or a healthy list of names to drop. It\xe2\x80\x99s about results. We know what needs to be achieved, and we work together to get the job done. Each of us uses our individual knowledge, creativity and resources to come up with fresh ideas and new concepts we can truly own. With that independence comes a high degree of responsibility and accountability, but we always rise to the occasion.

We\xe2\x80\x99re loyal to our coworkers, to our brands, and to the company. We lead by example to motivate those around us. We all share a passion for winning and are committed to building upon our success. We\xe2\x80\x99re focused on the future and excited to show the world that the best is yet to come.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:

Hoverstate is a digital consultancy with offices in California (Los Angeles, Oakland), Texas (Lubbock), Utah (Lehi), Washington (Seattle) and Italy (Milan, Turin) specializing in Health and Life Sciences. What Hoverstate Offers

Powered by JazzHR'

title: b'Web Designer / Front End Developer'
job description:
b'Conversion Labs is a young, growing digital marketing company committed to helping everyone live their healthiest life. 5
years of web design

years of front end dev experience

title: b'Backend Web Developer'
job description:
b'Have you ever build any of the most popular open-source browsers like Brave/Chromium/Firefox?

Would you be excited to the idea of setting up build pipelines for an open source browser?

System1 is hiring a Web Developer (back-end development) to join our team. This is a diverse role that will involve \xe2\x80\x9chacking\xe2\x80\x9d on the Mozilla platform, mostly on the backend. You will work with experts who know the Mozilla platform inside-out, while being a key contributor to novel open-source products which already have a passionate and growing user base.

Key goals for this role: Keep a \xe2\x80\x9cclassic\xe2\x80\x9d version of the browser up-to-date with security patches; update components where possible and create better compatibility with legacy add-ons for the newer version of the platform that supports them. Build system work is required for this role sometimes, but that\xe2\x80\x99s one of the fun parts!

The Role You Will Have
Write code and tests, build prototypes, tackle problems, profile and analyze bottlenecks
Learn about a wide variety of problems and solutions across a large, mature codebase (ex: how can we improve on the UX, make transitioning from other browsers easier, support legacy add-ons better?)
Must be familiar with JavaScript, C/C++, and Python
Work with driven, committed team members to help bring the most customizable web browser to a larger audience.

What You Will Bring
BS/MS in CS, CE or 3+ years relevant work experience
You are comfortable reading and writing in JavaScript and C/C++
You care deeply about making the browser fast and customizable (it takes trial and error to make things work on this code base, patience is ideal)
Proficiency setting up build pipelines for binaries with Multi OS support
Strong debugging skills (Valgrind, GDB)
Experience working with version control systems (especially git).

Bonus Points if You Have
Exposure to the internals of the Mozilla platform (SpiderMoney engine), or curiosity and drive to learn from experts on the team.
Interest in privacy and privacy-aware technologies.

What We Have To Offer
Free Uber/Lyft to and from work every day!
Collegial and collaborative team with highly intelligent and motivated coworkers
Cross-team lunches and demos to foster learning
Unlimited Paid Sick Time, Competitive PTO and Benefits package
Daily catered meals and fully stocked kitchen
Bi-weekly happy hour at various bars, restaurants, and venues across Los Angeles
Bi-weekly onsite happy hour
Catered dinner on Tuesdays and Thursdays
Weekly fitness class with private trainer: high intensity training, yoga, beach volleyball, beach soccer, ultimate frisbee
Company parties and outings: Skyzone indoor skydiving, Medieval Times, Karaoke, etc.

Related Searches: Backend Developer, Back-end Developer, Backend Web Developer, C/C++, Javascript,'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Job Description

\xe2\x80\x9cOutside the box. Above the Earth. Beyond our wildest dreams. Our engineers are creating new possibilities in space.\xe2\x80\x9d

We are looking for an experienced Web Developer that has experience with Python 3 programming in a Linux environment.

The successful candidate will be supporting JPL Mars 2020 flight mission developing critical software pertaining to the Engineering Analysis Subsystem (EAS) and the Robotic Planning Subsystem (RPS). The software will be in the critical path for mission surface operations in that it encompasses both the uplink and downlink process, downlink telemetry manipulation, and reporting to uplink interfaces for tactical operations.

Meet with and work with clients to address mission needs in a timely manner
Lead the development and maintenance of python-based web services to help tactical operations

Experience in Web programming utilizing HTML5 (binary web sockets, server sent events, cookies/session state management), CSS3, JavaScript (JSON, JQuery, WebGL, Virtual DOMs, e.g., React.js), REST APIs, single page web applications.
Experience with Agile software development and integration tools such as gitHub/gitLab, JIRA, Jenkins.

The work will be performed in Pasadena CA

Intelligence, Information and Services delivers innovative technology to make the world a safer place. IIS operates at nearly 550 sites in 80 countries, and is headquartered in Dulles, Virginia. The business area generated $6.2 billion in 2018 revenues. As a global business, our leaders must have the ability to understand, embrace and operate in a multicultural world -- in the marketplace and the workplace. We strive to hire people who reflect our communities and embrace diversity and inclusion to advance our culture, develop our employees, and grow our business.

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Web Developer
 Talento has partnered with a $5B US retailer with 1,000 stores and a large eCommerce presence. They are looking for a Sr. Web Developer with extensive experience in eCommerce building API\xe2\x80\x99s  to improve functionality, reliability and usability to a business critical application.

This is a remote contract that will last 2-3 months. The organization uses APTOS CRM & POS for the eCommerce website and stores. The web developer will serve as an SME on APTOS to build a seamless and fast connection between Synchrony (credit card issuer), the POS and CRM.

You will come solve this problem: When a buyer applies for a credit card online, they get approved/declined, you need to build the connection that takes the data from Synchrony through a secure data packet, take that file, decode it, adjust format data appropriately and insert it into the CRM record in APTOS.
 Responsibilities
Develop, design, test and debug applications starting at their foundation up to their production environments
evelop new application code as well as create integrations to pass data to and from internal/external systems like POS, Ecommerce, ERP, CRM and 3rd party vendors via ESB using multiple Restful APIs, web services, FTP files, etc.
Coordinate development efforts with internal teams and external teams
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability while ensuring application security
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ability to communicate technical issues effectively to non-technical parties
Team player mindset with ability to work independently and take initiative

Requirements
7+ years of web development experience
Experience implementing APIs
2+ years of recent experience of CRM development with APTOS
Strong experience with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and common JavaScript libraries such as jQuery required
Experience with supporting and maintaining business critical applications
Ability to prepare technical documentation
Must have strong application testing discipline
Knowledge of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) best practices is a plus

Talento Human Capital Management provides talent and organizational solutions enabling businesses to evolve beyond tactical human resources management. Our footprint spans across the US with teams in Miami Chicago NYC Los Angeles and throughout South America and Asia in Lima & India.

Our organization continues to thrive through our ongoing commitment to building an inclusive and diverse workforce from different backgrounds perspectives and skills. Talento Human Capital Management (HCM) is an equal opportunity employer and people are at the center of what we do!

People + Passion + Perseverance = Progress'

title: b'Backend Web Developer'
job description:
b"Job Description

Pacific Life is embarking on a multi-year initiative to invest in dynamic people and technology, ensuring a bright future for our customers and community. To support this process, we are looking for a skilled Back-End Web Developer\xe2\x80\xafto join our team in beautiful Newport Beach, CA.

As a Backend Web Developer, you will\xe2\x80\xafplay a key role in Pacific Life\xe2\x80\x99s digital and workplace transformation as part of the Customer Experience team responsible for designing and developing web applications for the Pacific Life customer-facing websites. You\xe2\x80\x99ll join a team that is focused on streamlining the experience for newly appointed advisors and new business submission, evolving how advisors engage with online resources and enhancing the digital experience for contract owners.

If you have significant hands-on, professional experience with web technologies and an ability to translate business needs into solutions, you\xe2\x80\x99re exactly who we\xe2\x80\x99re seeking.

What You\xe2\x80\x99ll Do
Improve customer experience by offering digital solutions to advisors and contract holders
Modernize legacy platforms to improve speed to market, leverage the latest automation technologies to increase efficiency
Design, document, develop, and implement/enhance highly scalable and secure Java Web Applications with focus on \xe2\x80\x9cback-end\xe2\x80\x9d development
Collaborate with front-end developers to ensure that user-facing and server-side elements work together seamlessly to deliver web applications optimized for customer experience
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Optimization of web applications for performance and scalability
Develop automated tests to ensure business needs are met and allow for regression testing
Tech & Tools You\xe2\x80\x99ll Use

Agile methodology, Weblogic, Tomcat, JBoss, REST web services, AWS web enabling technologies, Oracle, DB2

Factors\xe2\x80\xaffor\xe2\x80\xafSuccess
Bachelor's degree (B.A. or B.S.) from four-year college or university; or equivalent experience
5+ years web application design and development in a Java environment
AWS developer and/or architect certifications a plus
Experience using J2EE complaint application servers (Weblogic, Tomcat, JBoss)
Experience developing REST web services
Experience writing highly secure web applications
Experience with core AWS web enabling technologies
Experience with writing queries against relational databases (Oracle and DB2)
Experience being part of an Agile software development team
Growth mindset, challenging status quo to find new solutions and drive out-of-the-box ideas
System thinking and experiment-oriented mindset to drive innovation
Motivated by working within a strong team-oriented environment, holding each other accountable
Req Number
5098BR
Position Location(s)
Newport Beach, CA
Full Time / Part Time
full time

About Pacific Life

At Pacific Life, we know we\xe2\x80\x99re better when you can be your whole self \xe2\x80\x93 both in and out of the office. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we also allow employees to build flexibility into their work schedules, provided they consistently achieve their goals and provide demonstrable value for our policyholders.

In addition to the value we provide for our employees and policyholders, we are also renowned for our philanthropic work, having donated over $109M to nonprofits over the past 33 years. All this considered, it\xe2\x80\x99s no wonder we were named one of America\xe2\x80\x99s Best Mid-Size Employers by Forbes in 2019. Simply put, if you want to find fulfillment in both your career and your life, join our team at Pacific Life, where power meets purpose.

Benefits

For more than 150 years, Pacific Life has offered our clients innovative products and services that help them to reach their financial goals and safeguard their futures. To ensure our next 150 years are as prosperous as our first 150, we\xe2\x80\x99re fostering a culture of shared values across our company by providing generous compensation and comprehensive benefits that allow our employees to find fulfillment and security in personal life and career alike. These include:

Competitive salary and bonus program
Medical, dental, and vision as part our commitment to investing in the health and wellbeing of our employees
Two retirement savings plans: 401k savings plan with company match and Company Retirement Contribution (company-paid)
Generous vacation time and holiday pay

For additional information about open positions and other opportunities to join our team, visit www.pacificlife.com/home/Careers.html.
EEO Statement
Pacific Life Insurance Company is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer, M/F/D/V. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request an accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career center as a result of your disability. To request an accommodation, contact a Human Resources Representative at Pacific Life Insurance Company."

Will be spending time modifying content
Benefits

A competitive benefits package is offered complete with: health, transportation benefits, accrued sick-time off, and a 401k option. We unfortunately do not provide sponsorship.

Local candidates are preferred, as we do not provide relocation for interviews or accepted offers'

title: b'Web Developer/ Designer'
job description:
b"Information & Responsibilities
California Institute of the Arts is seeking a Web Developer/Designer to join our Communications team. We are seeking someone with a forward-looking sensibility who can work with the design, development and content staff to produce material that can be adapted across various digital media platforms. An interest in and experience with email design, information architecture and the ability to enable and enhance user experience are essential. The position will require someone with a knowledge of front-end web development and design and a strong appreciation for the technical aspects of digital work, as well as the ability to multitask and handle several deadlines at once.

Responsibilities

ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:
Develop mail marketing/template designs.
Assisting in the development of email protocols and streamlined processes throughout the Institute\xe2\x80\x99s schools and departments.
Maintaining current websites by working with content producers to ensure accurate information and well-designed layout for schools and departments.
Building informational and team sites on the CalArts intranet.
Resizing and optimizing graphics and video.
Work with other team members to deliver integrated digital and web solutions across multiple platforms.
Assist, as needed, with the design of new websites.
Research and stay current on effective UI/UX trends.
Maintain an awareness of contemporary digital graphic design.
Other duties as assigned on an as-needed basis.
Requirements
Experience designing/building websites from concept to launch.
Knowledge in HTML5 / CSS3 / JavaScript with a keen eye for design details.
Attention to detail needed to execute visual design well on the web.
Strong working knowledge of responsive web and email design and cross-platform compatible coding techniques and troubleshooting.
Familiar with and comfortable building for Content Management Systems, specifically DNN, Drupal, and WordPress.
Familiar with Adobe Creative Suite (many design files will come to you as either a PSD or InDesign file).
Believer in best practices and always aiming for clean, efficient code.
Experience developing/working with information architecture.
Creativity in problem solving.
Ability to work in a team and to communicate clearly.
Enthusiastic creative thinker, with a desire to learn new skills.
Collaborate with other campus technical staff and developers as needed.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google and Adobe applications.
Critical thinking skills required.
Interest or experience with motion graphics is a plus.
Perform other job-related duties and special projects as assigned.
Qualifications
At least two (2) years related, professional experience;
Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree desired
How to Apply
This position is available immediately. If you are interested, please follow this link to apply https://apply.interfolio.com/74609

Equity & Diversity

California Institute of the Arts (CalArts) seeks to employ faculty who can engage our diverse communities of learners at the highest levels of artistic endeavor and critical thinking. Across the range of practitioners from artists to scholars and librarians, we welcome candidates who possess a demonstrated worldview and cultural competency to support teaching and mentoring undergraduate and graduate students of varied backgrounds, capabilities, perspectives, social identities andgender expressions.CalArts is an equal opportunity employer.

Further Information

CalArts has a multidisciplinary approach to its studies of the arts through six schools: Art, Critical Studies, Dance, Film/Video, Music and Theater. CalArts encourages students to explore and recognize the complexity of the many aspects of the arts. It is supported by a distinguished faculty of practicing artists and provides its Bachelor and Master of Fine Arts students with the hands-on training and exposure necessary for an artist's growth. CalArts was founded in 1961 and opened in 1969 as the first institution of higher learning in the United States specifically for students interested in the pursuit of degrees in all areas of visual and performing arts."

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"About Higher Ground Education

At Higher Ground Education, we're driven by a deep desire to bring about widespread change in education today. We believe that the traditional method of education used in most schools is antiquated, outdated, and broken. To meet the needs of today's students and to bring about true progress in the world around us, we need an education model that fosters independence and develops competent, capable, action-oriented thinkers and change agents.

We believe that the key to international education reform lies in modernizing and mainstreaming the hugely impactful Montessori pedagogy. It is only then that we will succeed in enabling children across the world to realize their human potential as knowledge-guided, value-oriented, efficacious beings, so that they experience, undiluted and unimpeded, the joyous process of growing into successful adults.

Since our founding 3 years ago, we have opened 47 beautiful schools across the U.S. serving students from birth through high school. We have also launched an innovative, blended-learning training organization to fuel our growth.

The Web Developer Position

The Web Developer will work closely with the marketing and engineering teams to engage thousands of families and grow their awareness and engagement with Higher Ground Education and our multiple school brands.

This role will have a particular focus on optimizing our web marketing funnels and will live primarily on the digital marketing team. The digital marketing team runs outreach, engagement, cross-selling, and educational campaigns across email, social, and community channels. We are data-driven in everything we do.

Key Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To
Front-end design and development for websites and landing pages, including WordPress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Implementation of rich conversion tracking and A/B testing suites to optimize our marketing growth funnel
Quick ideation and creation of microsites and splash pages, in tandem with our marketing calendar
The further optimization of websites and other web marketing channels via A/B testing and conversion funnel improvements
Reporting with other departments based on pre-defined metrics

We'd love to talk to you if you possess:
3+ years of experience coding websites in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
3+ years of experience in creating website designs in Adobe, Sketch, and/or any other preferred design tools
Strong familiarity with WordPress and/or other CMS systems or website templating engines
Experience implementing growth tools such as A/B testing experiments, email marketing campaigns, Salesforce for CRM, and other tracking tools
A high degree of initiative and autonomy to lead your own initiatives
A performance- and results-oriented mindset
A bachelor's degree preferred in relevant field
A portfolio of work available on request

We'd really love to talk to you if you also possess:
Coding experience in ASP.NET MVC and its front-end Razor syntax
Comfort in working with APIs and in bridging the gaps between the front-end and back-end databases and third-party applications
Comfort stepping into pre-existing codebases and branding decisions, working to make them your own over time


What We Offer
A competitive salary
Health, dental, and vision insurance
Paid time off and paid holidays
100% tuition discount for two children at any school within our network (we serve children as young as 6 weeks through 12th grade).
Open to remote work
Fun training & onboarding at HQ
A network of supportive peers and mentors who regularly share best practices
Career growth and promotion opportunities
The opportunity to contribute to a high-quality educational program that serves the individual needs of each child

Want to get to know us better? Check out:
The Higher Ground Story:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEStory
The Higher Ground Mission:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEMission
Facebook:\xe2\x80\xafFacebook.com/highergroundeducation"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description: b"Description We are looking for experienced Sr. Web Developer who will be responsible for the development, maintenance and enhancement of our new E-Commerce platform as well as other online websites. *\nDeveloper will be responsible for data exchange and system integrations utilizing third party feeds, Web Services/API's etc. * As a senior member of the team, you will be expected to drive throughout their life cycle: requirements, architecture/design, implementation, testing, and launch. * Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards with Up-to-date latest web trends, techniques and technologies * Proven ability to translate complex business needs into technical solutions * Leads and participates in medium to large scale projects * Provides and supports the implementation of business solutions ,Troubleshoots business and production issues , Ability to work well under tight schedules * Minimum Requirements SKILLS & ABILITIES (Technical Skills/ knowledge required) Technical Skills/ knowledge required * 5+ Years of full-time professional Web Development experience and working experience with Enterprise Magento Version 1 or 2 and extensions * Experience with PHP, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML 5, CSS3 * Must be Proficient with Linux and Linux Commands , Knowledge with NGINX and Fast-CGI * Experience with MySQL Database - Views, Stored Procedures, Triggers, Indexes * Experience with Building Web Services/API's of REST, CURL, SOAP * Secure development using GitHub * Object oriented programming concepts and design * A plus for experience with Node.js, Angular and AWS cloud * A plus for experience with Mobile Applications built with Swift, Java or Phone Gap * E-commerce retail industry experience Education * BS degree in related field or relevant work experience"

title: b'Web App Developer (React)'
job description:
b'What sets us apart
:

We support every major platform, including desktops, mobile devices, smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles, providing an opportunity to work across platforms and teams to push Plex forward.
We support every major platform, including desktops, mobile devices, smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles, providing an opportunity to work across platforms and teams to push Plex forward.

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'Web Application Developer

About Us

Torrance Job Description:

Phyn is changing the way people think about water. In just nine years nearly two in three people may face a shortage of clean water. Yet in the U.S alone, people unknowingly waste a trillion gallons of water per year, largely because it\xe2\x80\x99s an invisible problem that is hidden behind the walls, underground, or simply ignored. But what if it could become more visible? We believe that creating the tools to bring issues to light before they start is the key to saving water, saving money and, just maybe, saving the planet.

Phyn is the result of nearly a decade of research, development, and testing. We are currently searching for a Web Developer to accelerate our successful post launch plans. You will be a critical member of a small, customer focused, engineering team for our React JS and React Native Web, iPhone and Android applications. This isn\xe2\x80\x99t an average position where you might be restricted to one small piece of the company\xe2\x80\x99s technology, but one where you\xe2\x80\x99ll have influence over our whole web and mobile program, from design to production. If you want to work on products that will have an impact on solving a major global issue with tremendous growth opportunity, this is the opportunity to consider.

The successful candidate has sufficient experience and expertise to imaginatively address tasks/assignments of a medium to complex level. Structures and manages the execution of project/program tasks with little guidance and supervision and recommends and executes new approaches. Assignments will require technical analysis and inventive design recommendations for cost effective resolutions of problems. Coordinates across functional groups to ensure all tasks and input are received. Leads technical support staff in testing and analysis. Contributes ideas and/or concepts that support the generation of intellectual property. The successful candidate takes initiative and demonstrates self-motivation and enthusiasm to solve problems.

What We Want You To Do
Develop browser based responsive dynamic web applications.
Experienced with React JS, Redux and Node.js frameworks.
Expert level understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
Experience working with UX Design Tools such as Invision.
Work with UX Team and produce excellent UI confirming to UX requirements.
Familiarity with mobile application development using React Native for iOS and Android.
Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.
Integrate with our backend services to make sure we are delivering a great web and mobile user experience that\xe2\x80\x99s super-fast for end users.
Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and have the chance to contribute innovative and original ideas to our technology, algorithms and product.
Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results within a schedule.


Who You Are

You want to work on challenging problems with smart people. You\xe2\x80\x99re someone who could get positions at most software companies, but you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for the perfect role that has great leadership, a roster of top talent, game-changing product vision, and a work hard/play hard company culture.

You also meet most (if not all) of the following requirements:
Requires a bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or any other technical discipline with equivalent experience.
Employees entering this job typically have 5 or more years of directly related experience in web application development with a demonstrated record of leadership designing and shipping products/features.
Personal commitment to continuously learn and improve.
5 to 7 years of recent hands-on software design and coding experience.
A track record of projects completed on time \xe2\x80\x93 you are a flawless executor and know how to build great software.
Evidence of being self-motivated and driven \xe2\x80\x93 you find satisfaction in a job well done and want to solve hard problems.
Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.


Experience With WordPress Preferred

What you\xe2\x80\x99re getting into

We\xe2\x80\x99ve got big collaborative spaces for your big ideas, so bring an open mind and leave your suit in the closet. We all are committed to creating unique and rewarding consumer experiences. Everyone is interested in succeeding \xe2\x80\x93 for the team, for themselves and for the business. Cross-functionally and across the company, everyone has common goals and aspires to be their best.

You will learn something new or at least look at things differently every day. There are so many smart and creative people around that you\xe2\x80\x99ll be motivated to pursue the ideal.

Team spirit is infectious. Belkin is an extremely open workplace, where communication is essential. Not every idea will be accepted, but you\xe2\x80\x99ll be asked for your point of view. Innovation thrives on multiple and varied levels. At Belkin we challenge conventional wisdom and refuse to accept that something cannot be done.

We are committed to diversity. Belkin is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace.

All candidates applying for a job in the EMEA region, please review the Applicant Privacy notice HERE
Location: Torrance, California

Posted 14 Days Ago Full time 10008978

At Belkin International, people come first. Without question, the single greatest contributing factor to our nearly 30 years of success is our talented and ambitious staff. We\xe2\x80\x99ve found that by creating an inspirational, supportive and enriching environment, we thrive.

Around here, it\xe2\x80\x99s not about fancy titles, strong political positioning skills, or a healthy list of names to drop. It\xe2\x80\x99s about results. We know what needs to be achieved, and we work together to get the job done. Each of us uses our individual knowledge, creativity and resources to come up with fresh ideas and new concepts we can truly own. With that independence comes a high degree of responsibility and accountability, but we always rise to the occasion.

We\xe2\x80\x99re loyal to our coworkers, to our brands, and to the company. We lead by example to motivate those around us. We all share a passion for winning and are committed to building upon our success. We\xe2\x80\x99re focused on the future and excited to show the world that the best is yet to come.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Company Overview

Hoverstate is a digital consultancy with offices in California (Los Angeles, Oakland), Texas (Lubbock), Utah (Lehi), Washington (Seattle) and Italy (Milan, Turin) specializing in Health and Life Sciences. We focus on: delivering customer-centric transformation and innovative digital products, forward-thinking technology strategies, leveraging compliant technologies, developing rock-solid code, testing our products with a robust QA team/automation, then backing it all with marketing support. Our mission is to continually create best-in-class user experiences through our robust design and testing practices, backed by some pretty impressive feats of technology, to bring this slow-to-innovate sector into the 21st century.

What Hoverstate Offers

Powered by JazzHR'

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'About Us

Job Description

Phyn is changing the way people think about water. In just nine years nearly two in three people may face a shortage of clean water. Yet in the U.S alone, people unknowingly waste a trillion gallons of water per year, largely because it\xe2\x80\x99s an invisible problem that is hidden behind the walls, underground, or simply ignored. But what if it could become more visible? We believe that creating the tools to bring issues to light before they start is the key to saving water, saving money and, just maybe, saving the planet.

Phyn is the result of nearly a decade of research, development, and testing. We are currently searching for a Web Developer to accelerate our successful post launch plans. You will be a critical member of a small, customer focused, engineering team for our React JS and React Native Web, iPhone and Android applications. This isn\xe2\x80\x99t an average position where you might be restricted to one small piece of the company\xe2\x80\x99s technology, but one where you\xe2\x80\x99ll have influence over our whole web and mobile program, from design to production. If you want to work on products that will have an impact on solving a major global issue with tremendous growth opportunity, this is the opportunity to consider.

The successful candidate has sufficient experience and expertise to imaginatively address tasks/assignments of a medium to complex level. Structures and manages the execution of project/program tasks with little guidance and supervision and recommends and executes new approaches. Assignments will require technical analysis and inventive design recommendations for cost effective resolutions of problems. Coordinates across functional groups to ensure all tasks and input are received. Leads technical support staff in testing and analysis. Contributes ideas and/or concepts that support the generation of intellectual property. The successful candidate takes initiative and demonstrates self-motivation and enthusiasm to solve problems.

What We Want You To Do
Develop browser based responsive dynamic web applications.
Experienced with React JS, Redux and Node.js frameworks.
Expert level understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
Experience working with UX Design Tools such as Invision.
Work with UX Team and produce excellent UI confirming to UX requirements.
Familiarity with mobile application development using React Native for iOS and Android.
Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.
Integrate with our backend services to make sure we are delivering a great web and mobile user experience that\xe2\x80\x99s super-fast for end users.
Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and have the chance to contribute innovative and original ideas to our technology, algorithms and product.
Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results within a schedule.

Who You Are

You want to work on challenging problems with smart people. You\xe2\x80\x99re someone who could get positions at most software companies, but you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for the perfect role that has great leadership, a roster of top talent, game-changing product vision, and a work hard/play hard company culture.

You also meet most (if not all) of the following requirements:
Requires a bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or any other technical discipline with equivalent experience.
Employees entering this job typically have 5 or more years of directly related experience in web application development with a demonstrated record of leadership designing and shipping products/features.
Personal commitment to continuously learn and improve.
5 to 7 years of recent hands-on software design and coding experience.
A track record of projects completed on time \xe2\x80\x93 you are a flawless executor and know how to build great software.
Evidence of being self-motivated and driven \xe2\x80\x93 you find satisfaction in a job well done and want to solve hard problems.
Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.

Experience With WordPress Preferred

We are committed to diversity. Phyn LLC is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V.

Location:
Torrance, California'

Our in-house services extend from design to content development, production and delivery. We also offer web site development, hosting and management, as well as cross-promotion of print and online vehicles for maximum return. Because we help our clients succeed, they stay with us for many years."

full time

At Pacific Life, we know we\xe2\x80\x99re better when you can be your whole self \xe2\x80\x93 both in and out of the office. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we also allow employees to build flexibility into their work schedules, provided they consistently achieve their goals and provide demonstrable value for our policyholders.

In addition to the value we provide for our employees and policyholders, we are also renowned for our philanthropic work, having donated over $109M to nonprofits over the past 33 years. All this considered, it\xe2\x80\x99s no wonder we were named one of America\xe2\x80\x99s Best Mid-Size Employers by Forbes in 2019. Simply put, if you want to find fulfillment in both your career and your life, join our team at Pacific Life, where power meets purpose.

Benefits

To ensure our next 150 years are as prosperous as our first 150, we\xe2\x80\x99re fostering a culture of shared values across our company by providing generous compensation and comprehensive benefits that allow our employees to find fulfillment and security in personal life and career alike. These include:

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request an accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career center as a result of your disability. job description:

Strong working knowledge of responsive web and email design and cross-platform compatible coding techniques and troubleshooting.

Qualifications

Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree desired
How to Apply
This position is available immediately. If you are interested, please follow this link to apply https://apply.interfolio.com/74609

Equity & Diversity

California Institute of the Arts (CalArts) seeks to employ faculty who can engage our diverse communities of learners at the highest levels of artistic endeavor and critical thinking. Across the range of practitioners from artists to scholars and librarians, we welcome candidates who possess a demonstrated worldview and cultural competency to support teaching and mentoring undergraduate and graduate students of varied backgrounds, capabilities, perspectives, social identities andgender expressions.CalArts is an equal opportunity employer.

Further Information

CalArts has a multidisciplinary approach to its studies of the arts through six schools: Art, Critical Studies, Dance, Film/Video, Music and Theater. CalArts encourages students to explore and recognize the complexity of the many aspects of the arts. It is supported by a distinguished faculty of practicing artists and provides its Bachelor and Master of Fine Arts students with the hands-on training and exposure necessary for an artist's growth. CalArts was founded in 1961 and opened in 1969 as the first institution of higher learning in the United States specifically for students interested in the pursuit of degrees in all areas of visual and performing arts."

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"About Higher Ground Education

At Higher Ground Education, we're driven by a deep desire to bring about widespread change in education today. We believe that the traditional method of education used in most schools is antiquated, outdated, and broken. To meet the needs of today's students and to bring about true progress in the world around us, we need an education model that fosters independence and develops competent, capable, action-oriented thinkers and change agents.

We believe that the key to international education reform lies in modernizing and mainstreaming the hugely impactful Montessori pedagogy. It is only then that we will succeed in enabling children across the world to realize their human potential as knowledge-guided, value-oriented, efficacious beings, so that they experience, undiluted and unimpeded, the joyous process of growing into successful adults.

Since our founding 3 years ago, we have opened 47 beautiful schools across the U.S. serving students from birth through high school. We have also launched an innovative, blended-learning training organization to fuel our growth.

The Web Developer Position

The Web Developer will work closely with the marketing and engineering teams to engage thousands of families and grow their awareness and engagement with Higher Ground Education and our multiple school brands.

This role will have a particular focus on optimizing our web marketing funnels and will live primarily on the digital marketing team. The digital marketing team runs outreach, engagement, cross-selling, and educational campaigns across email, social, and community channels. We are data-driven in everything we do.

Key Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To
Front-end design and development for websites and landing pages, including WordPress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Implementation of rich conversion tracking and A/B testing suites to optimize our marketing growth funnel
Quick ideation and creation of microsites and splash pages, in tandem with our marketing calendar
The further optimization of websites and other web marketing channels via A/B testing and conversion funnel improvements
Reporting with other departments based on pre-defined metrics

We'd love to talk to you if you possess:
3+ years of experience coding websites in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
3+ years of experience in creating website designs in Adobe, Sketch, and/or any other preferred design tools
Strong familiarity with WordPress and/or other CMS systems or website templating engines
Experience implementing growth tools such as A/B testing experiments, email marketing campaigns, Salesforce for CRM, and other tracking tools
A high degree of initiative and autonomy to lead your own initiatives
A performance- and results-oriented mindset
A bachelor's degree preferred in relevant field
A portfolio of work available on request

We'd really love to talk to you if you also possess:
Coding experience in ASP.NET MVC and its front-end Razor syntax
Comfort in working with APIs and in bridging the gaps between the front-end and back-end databases and third-party applications
Comfort stepping into pre-existing codebases and branding decisions, working to make them your own over time


What We Offer
A competitive salary
Health, dental, and vision insurance
Paid time off and paid holidays
100% tuition discount for two children at any school within our network (we serve children as young as 6 weeks through 12th grade).
Open to remote work
Fun training & onboarding at HQ
A network of supportive peers and mentors who regularly share best practices
Career growth and promotion opportunities
The opportunity to contribute to a high-quality educational program that serves the individual needs of each child

Want to get to know us better? Check out:
The Higher Ground Story:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEStory
The Higher Ground Mission:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEMission
Facebook:\xe2\x80\xafFacebook.com/highergroundeducation"

About Esri

title: b'Web App Developer (React)'
job description:
b'What sets us apart
:

We support every major platform, including desktops, mobile devices, smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles, providing an opportunity to work across platforms and teams to push Plex forward.
We support every major platform, including desktops, mobile devices, smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles, providing an opportunity to work across platforms and teams to push Plex forward.

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'Web Application Developer

About Us

Torrance Job Description:

Phyn is changing the way people think about water. In just nine years nearly two in three people may face a shortage of clean water. Yet in the U.S alone, people unknowingly waste a trillion gallons of water per year, largely because it\xe2\x80\x99s an invisible problem that is hidden behind the walls, underground, or simply ignored. But what if it could become more visible? We believe that creating the tools to bring issues to light before they start is the key to saving water, saving money and, just maybe, saving the planet.

Phyn is the result of nearly a decade of research, development, and testing. We are currently searching for a Web Developer to accelerate our successful post launch plans. You will be a critical member of a small, customer focused, engineering team for our React JS and React Native Web, iPhone and Android applications. This isn\xe2\x80\x99t an average position where you might be restricted to one small piece of the company\xe2\x80\x99s technology, but one where you\xe2\x80\x99ll have influence over our whole web and mobile program, from design to production. If you want to work on products that will have an impact on solving a major global issue with tremendous growth opportunity, this is the opportunity to consider.

The successful candidate has sufficient experience and expertise to imaginatively address tasks/assignments of a medium to complex level. Structures and manages the execution of project/program tasks with little guidance and supervision and recommends and executes new approaches. Assignments will require technical analysis and inventive design recommendations for cost effective resolutions of problems. Coordinates across functional groups to ensure all tasks and input are received. Leads technical support staff in testing and analysis. Contributes ideas and/or concepts that support the generation of intellectual property. The successful candidate takes initiative and demonstrates self-motivation and enthusiasm to solve problems.

What We Want You To Do
Develop browser based responsive dynamic web applications.
Experienced with React JS, Redux and Node.js frameworks.
Expert level understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
Experience working with UX Design Tools such as Invision.
Work with UX Team and produce excellent UI confirming to UX requirements.
Familiarity with mobile application development using React Native for iOS and Android.
Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.
Integrate with our backend services to make sure we are delivering a great web and mobile user experience that\xe2\x80\x99s super-fast for end users.
Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and have the chance to contribute innovative and original ideas to our technology, algorithms and product.
Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results within a schedule.


Who You Are

You want to work on challenging problems with smart people. You\xe2\x80\x99re someone who could get positions at most software companies, but you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for the perfect role that has great leadership, a roster of top talent, game-changing product vision, and a work hard/play hard company culture.

You also meet most (if not all) of the following requirements:
Requires a bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or any other technical discipline with equivalent experience.
Employees entering this job typically have 5 or more years of directly related experience in web application development with a demonstrated record of leadership designing and shipping products/features.
Personal commitment to continuously learn and improve.
5 to 7 years of recent hands-on software design and coding experience.
A track record of projects completed on time \xe2\x80\x93 you are a flawless executor and know how to build great software.
Evidence of being self-motivated and driven \xe2\x80\x93 you find satisfaction in a job well done and want to solve hard problems.
Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.


Experience With WordPress Preferred

What you\xe2\x80\x99re getting into

We\xe2\x80\x99ve got big collaborative spaces for your big ideas, so bring an open mind and leave your suit in the closet. We all are committed to creating unique and rewarding consumer experiences. Everyone is interested in succeeding \xe2\x80\x93 for the team, for themselves and for the business. Cross-functionally and across the company, everyone has common goals and aspires to be their best.

You will learn something new or at least look at things differently every day. There are so many smart and creative people around that you\xe2\x80\x99ll be motivated to pursue the ideal.

Team spirit is infectious. Belkin is an extremely open workplace, where communication is essential. Not every idea will be accepted, but you\xe2\x80\x99ll be asked for your point of view. Innovation thrives on multiple and varied levels. At Belkin we challenge conventional wisdom and refuse to accept that something cannot be done.

We are committed to diversity. Belkin is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace.

All candidates applying for a job in the EMEA region, please review the Applicant Privacy notice HERE
Location: Torrance, California

Posted 14 Days Ago Full time 10008978

At Belkin International, people come first. Without question, the single greatest contributing factor to our nearly 30 years of success is our talented and ambitious staff. We\xe2\x80\x99ve found that by creating an inspirational, supportive and enriching environment, we thrive.

Around here, it\xe2\x80\x99s not about fancy titles, strong political positioning skills, or a healthy list of names to drop. It\xe2\x80\x99s about results. We know what needs to be achieved, and we work together to get the job done. Each of us uses our individual knowledge, creativity and resources to come up with fresh ideas and new concepts we can truly own. With that independence comes a high degree of responsibility and accountability, but we always rise to the occasion.

We\xe2\x80\x99re loyal to our coworkers, to our brands, and to the company. We lead by example to motivate those around us. We all share a passion for winning and are committed to building upon our success. We\xe2\x80\x99re focused on the future and excited to show the world that the best is yet to come.'

Hoverstate is a digital consultancy with offices in California (Los Angeles, Oakland), Texas (Lubbock), Utah (Lehi), Washington (Seattle) and Italy (Milan, Turin) specializing in Health and Life Sciences. Our mission is to continually create best-in-class user experiences through our robust design and testing practices, backed by some pretty impressive feats of technology, to bring this slow-to-innovate sector into the 21st century.

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'About Us

Job Description

Phyn is changing the way people think about water. In just nine years nearly two in three people may face a shortage of clean water. Yet in the U.S alone, people unknowingly waste a trillion gallons of water per year, largely because it\xe2\x80\x99s an invisible problem that is hidden behind the walls, underground, or simply ignored. But what if it could become more visible? We believe that creating the tools to bring issues to light before they start is the key to saving water, saving money and, just maybe, saving the planet.

Phyn is the result of nearly a decade of research, development, and testing. We are currently searching for a Web Developer to accelerate our successful post launch plans. You will be a critical member of a small, customer focused, engineering team for our React JS and React Native Web, iPhone and Android applications. This isn\xe2\x80\x99t an average position where you might be restricted to one small piece of the company\xe2\x80\x99s technology, but one where you\xe2\x80\x99ll have influence over our whole web and mobile program, from design to production. If you want to work on products that will have an impact on solving a major global issue with tremendous growth opportunity, this is the opportunity to consider.

The successful candidate has sufficient experience and expertise to imaginatively address tasks/assignments of a medium to complex level. Structures and manages the execution of project/program tasks with little guidance and supervision and recommends and executes new approaches. Assignments will require technical analysis and inventive design recommendations for cost effective resolutions of problems. Coordinates across functional groups to ensure all tasks and input are received. Leads technical support staff in testing and analysis. Contributes ideas and/or concepts that support the generation of intellectual property. The successful candidate takes initiative and demonstrates self-motivation and enthusiasm to solve problems.

What We Want You To Do
Develop browser based responsive dynamic web applications.
Experienced with React JS, Redux and Node.js frameworks.
Expert level understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
Experience working with UX Design Tools such as Invision.
Work with UX Team and produce excellent UI confirming to UX requirements.
Familiarity with mobile application development using React Native for iOS and Android.
Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.
Integrate with our backend services to make sure we are delivering a great web and mobile user experience that\xe2\x80\x99s super-fast for end users.
Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and have the chance to contribute innovative and original ideas to our technology, algorithms and product.
Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results within a schedule.

Who You Are

You want to work on challenging problems with smart people. You\xe2\x80\x99re someone who could get positions at most software companies, but you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for the perfect role that has great leadership, a roster of top talent, game-changing product vision, and a work hard/play hard company culture.

You also meet most (if not all) of the following requirements:
Requires a bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or any other technical discipline with equivalent experience.
Employees entering this job typically have 5 or more years of directly related experience in web application development with a demonstrated record of leadership designing and shipping products/features.
Personal commitment to continuously learn and improve.
5 to 7 years of recent hands-on software design and coding experience.
A track record of projects completed on time \xe2\x80\x93 you are a flawless executor and know how to build great software.
Evidence of being self-motivated and driven \xe2\x80\x93 you find satisfaction in a job well done and want to solve hard problems.
Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.

Experience With WordPress Preferred

We are committed to diversity. Phyn LLC is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V.

Location:
Torrance, California'

title: b'Web Analytics Software Developer Intern'
job description:
b'Job Description

TechStyle Fashion Group is currently seeking a Web Analytics Software Developer to join the Data Analytics team for Summer 2020.

The web analytics software developer intern will join the data analytics team to aide in development, guidance, and direction setting for web and mobile analytics. The right candidate would be a self-motivated, highly detail-oriented team-player with a positive drive to strategize and implement data driven solutions that enable the business to derive valuable insights.

You will join a team of experienced data leaders in developing and integrating a completely new web and mobile analytics solutions to power machine learning algorithms and derive business insights including business strategy, customer experience, and personalization engines. This is an exciting opportunity for anyone interested in pursuing a career in data, providing hands on experience with software development, data engineering, architecture, and big data

What You Will Learn: Interns will gain hands-on experience on:
Leveraging academic knowledge of Javascript in a work environment to create a state of the art web and mobile analytics solution
Implementing, integrating, and maintaining a new customer data platform to power machine learning and business insights
Working with integration developers, product managers, and the data analytics team to produce a web and mobile analytics solution focused on clean data
Partnering with senior architects, product managers, engineering teams, core architecture teams, end business users, and other teams to deliver a robust data services platform
Opportunity to work across technologies and coding languages with experts in React, Kafka, Java, and Javascript to product a leading solution in the analytics space for clean customer data


Qualifications
Graduating in June 2020 or earlier, Preferred majors/minors in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field
Ability to learn quickly and multi-task in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Must be familiar with Javascript with preference for candidates with previous academic or work experience with coding in Javascript
Desire to leverage existing knowledge to gain hands on experience working with software development and complex data structures, including the process to implement a customer data platform that replaces the existing data lay
Analytical thinker with logical structuring skills and ability to communicate thought processes articulately


The Intern Gig: TechStyle Fashion Group is looking for enthusiastic students with ambition to go far. Our internship program will give you a chance to gain in-depth knowledge of what it is like to be a TechStyle Fashion Group employee and to be a part of our fast and innovative company culture. Our summer internship program will last for 9 weeks and start at the beginning of June, with the unique opportunity to gain real work experience, while participating in fun social activities and offsites throughout the duration of the internship assignment.

TechStyle is an Equal Opportunity Employer: M/F/PV/D (minority, female, protected veteran, disability)'

title: b'Backend Web Developer'
job description:
b"Job Description

Pacific Life is embarking on a multi-year initiative to invest in dynamic people and technology, ensuring a bright future for our customers and community. To support this process, we are looking for a skilled Back-End Web Developer\xe2\x80\xafto join our team in beautiful Newport Beach, CA.

As a Backend Web Developer, you will\xe2\x80\xafplay a key role in Pacific Life\xe2\x80\x99s digital and workplace transformation as part of the Customer Experience team responsible for designing and developing web applications for the Pacific Life customer-facing websites. You\xe2\x80\x99ll join a team that is focused on streamlining the experience for newly appointed advisors and new business submission, evolving how advisors engage with online resources and enhancing the digital experience for contract owners.

If you have significant hands-on, professional experience with web technologies and an ability to translate business needs into solutions, you\xe2\x80\x99re exactly who we\xe2\x80\x99re seeking.

What You\xe2\x80\x99ll Do

Modernize legacy platforms to improve speed to market, leverage the latest automation technologies to increase efficiency

Factors\xe2\x80\xaffor\xe2\x80\xafSuccess

Motivated by working within a strong team-oriented environment, holding each other accountable

5098BR
Position Location(s)
Newport Beach, CA

full time

About Pacific Life

At Pacific Life, we know we\xe2\x80\x99re better when you can be your whole self \xe2\x80\x93 both in and out of the office. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we also allow employees to build flexibility into their work schedules, provided they consistently achieve their goals and provide demonstrable value for our policyholders.

In addition to the value we provide for our employees and policyholders, we are also renowned for our philanthropic work, having donated over $109M to nonprofits over the past 33 years. All this considered, it\xe2\x80\x99s no wonder we were named one of America\xe2\x80\x99s Best Mid-Size Employers by Forbes in 2019. Simply put, if you want to find fulfillment in both your career and your life, join our team at Pacific Life, where power meets purpose.

Benefits

For more than 150 years, Pacific Life has offered our clients innovative products and services that help them to reach their financial goals and safeguard their futures. To ensure our next 150 years are as prosperous as our first 150, we\xe2\x80\x99re fostering a culture of shared values across our company by providing generous compensation and comprehensive benefits that allow our employees to find fulfillment and security in personal life and career alike. These include:

Medical, dental, and vision as part our commitment to investing in the health and wellbeing of our employees
Two retirement savings plans: 401k savings plan with company match and Company Retirement Contribution (company-paid)
Generous vacation time and holiday pay

For additional information about open positions and other opportunities to join our team, visit www.pacificlife.com/home/Careers.html.
EEO Statement
Pacific Life Insurance Company is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer, M/F/D/V. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request an accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career center as a result of your disability. To request an accommodation, contact a Human Resources Representative at Pacific Life Insurance Company."

job description:
b"Information & Responsibilities
California Institute of the Arts is seeking a Web Developer/Designer to join our Communications team. How to Apply
This position is available immediately. If you are interested, please follow this link to apply https://apply.interfolio.com/74609

Equity & Diversity

California Institute of the Arts (CalArts) seeks to employ faculty who can engage our diverse communities of learners at the highest levels of artistic endeavor and critical thinking. Across the range of practitioners from artists to scholars and librarians, we welcome candidates who possess a demonstrated worldview and cultural competency to support teaching and mentoring undergraduate and graduate students of varied backgrounds, capabilities, perspectives, social identities andgender expressions.CalArts is an equal opportunity employer.

Further Information

CalArts has a multidisciplinary approach to its studies of the arts through six schools: Art, Critical Studies, Dance, Film/Video, Music and Theater. CalArts encourages students to explore and recognize the complexity of the many aspects of the arts. It is supported by a distinguished faculty of practicing artists and provides its Bachelor and Master of Fine Arts students with the hands-on training and exposure necessary for an artist's growth. CalArts was founded in 1961 and opened in 1969 as the first institution of higher learning in the United States specifically for students interested in the pursuit of degrees in all areas of visual and performing arts."

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"About Higher Ground Education

At Higher Ground Education, we're driven by a deep desire to bring about widespread change in education today. We believe that the traditional method of education used in most schools is antiquated, outdated, and broken. To meet the needs of today's students and to bring about true progress in the world around us, we need an education model that fosters independence and develops competent, capable, action-oriented thinkers and change agents.

We believe that the key to international education reform lies in modernizing and mainstreaming the hugely impactful Montessori pedagogy. It is only then that we will succeed in enabling children across the world to realize their human potential as knowledge-guided, value-oriented, efficacious beings, so that they experience, undiluted and unimpeded, the joyous process of growing into successful adults.

Since our founding 3 years ago, we have opened 47 beautiful schools across the U.S. serving students from birth through high school. We have also launched an innovative, blended-learning training organization to fuel our growth.

The Web Developer Position

The Web Developer will work closely with the marketing and engineering teams to engage thousands of families and grow their awareness and engagement with Higher Ground Education and our multiple school brands.

This role will have a particular focus on optimizing our web marketing funnels and will live primarily on the digital marketing team. The digital marketing team runs outreach, engagement, cross-selling, and educational campaigns across email, social, and community channels. We are data-driven in everything we do.

Key Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To
Front-end design and development for websites and landing pages, including WordPress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Implementation of rich conversion tracking and A/B testing suites to optimize our marketing growth funnel
Quick ideation and creation of microsites and splash pages, in tandem with our marketing calendar
The further optimization of websites and other web marketing channels via A/B testing and conversion funnel improvements
Reporting with other departments based on pre-defined metrics

We'd love to talk to you if you possess:
3+ years of experience coding websites in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
3+ years of experience in creating website designs in Adobe, Sketch, and/or any other preferred design tools
Strong familiarity with WordPress and/or other CMS systems or website templating engines
Experience implementing growth tools such as A/B testing experiments, email marketing campaigns, Salesforce for CRM, and other tracking tools
A high degree of initiative and autonomy to lead your own initiatives
A performance- and results-oriented mindset
A bachelor's degree preferred in relevant field
A portfolio of work available on request

We'd really love to talk to you if you also possess:
Coding experience in ASP.NET MVC and its front-end Razor syntax
Comfort in working with APIs and in bridging the gaps between the front-end and back-end databases and third-party applications
Comfort stepping into pre-existing codebases and branding decisions, working to make them your own over time


What We Offer
A competitive salary
Health, dental, and vision insurance
Paid time off and paid holidays
100% tuition discount for two children at any school within our network (we serve children as young as 6 weeks through 12th grade).
Open to remote work
Fun training & onboarding at HQ
A network of supportive peers and mentors who regularly share best practices
Career growth and promotion opportunities
The opportunity to contribute to a high-quality educational program that serves the individual needs of each child

Want to get to know us better? Check out:
The Higher Ground Story:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEStory
The Higher Ground Mission:\xe2\x80\xafhttp://bit.ly/HGEMission

title: b'Web App Developer (React)'
job description:
b'What sets us apart
:

We support every major platform, including desktops, mobile devices, smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles, providing an opportunity to work across platforms and teams to push Plex forward.
