title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Company Overview

Hoverstate is a digital consultancy with offices in California (Los Angeles, Oakland), Texas (Lubbock), Utah (Lehi), Washington (Seattle) and Italy (Milan, Turin) specializing in Health and Life Sciences. We focus on: delivering customer-centric transformation and innovative digital products, forward-thinking technology strategies, leveraging compliant technologies, developing rock-solid code, testing our products with a robust QA team/automation, then backing it all with marketing support. If there is a problem to be solved in the digital space, Hoverstate can solve it.

Since 2008, Hoverstate has counted world-renowned health insurance and life sciences companies among our roster of clients. Our focused expertise keeps our clients on top of changes in policy, privacy rules and usability for their customers. Our mission is to continually create best-in-class user experiences through our robust design and testing practices, backed by some pretty impressive feats of technology, to bring this slow-to-innovate sector into the 21st century.

Hoverstate + Pega: A Long History. Hoverstate has been a Certified Pega partner since 2013. Every day we leverage Pega's adaptable architecture to deliver applications to our clients in record time while creating outstanding user experiences with meaningful business results. Thanks to our extensive experience, and proven ability to execute Pega projects the "Pega Way", we were chosen as one of the first Pega Ventures funded partners in 2017. That means we have the full backing and endorsement of Pegasystems.

Job Summary

The Developer role is responsible for producing detailed specifications and writing program code to implement design, installation, testing, and maintenance of software systems according to a client's specifications. We are currently looking for a senior Angular developer.

Responsibilities And Duties
Develop applications that effectively accomplish client objectives and user needs
Design and write code for applications
Analyze and edit existing computer applications to improve functionality
Remodel and adapt applications as needed to optimize performance
Test applications extensively to ensure they are error and bug free

2+ years experience as an applications developer
Angular experience
Predictive Index

In addition to applying, please follow this link to take the Behavioral and Cognitive assessments from Predictive Index: https://assess.predictiveindex.com/yqO7O

What Hoverstate Offers

Pay | competitive salary and bonus plan, maternity/paternity leave

Health | generous healthcare benefits

PTO | unlimited vacation, all holidays, sick and bereavement leave

401K | company contributions 100% vested as soon as you start contributing

Relocation | relocation assistance

Continuing Education | yearly stipend for your choice of ongoing education, conference attendance, training or certification

Growth | join Hoverstate for the opportunity to join a rapidly growing, well-established business that offers accelerated recognition and rewards, where you'll see your contributions and great ideas directly impact our business

Environment | fun, friendly, collaborative, innovative, fast, yet professional!

Networking | regular, personal interaction with the Hoverstate senior leadership team and senior leadership of our clients.

Powered by JazzHR'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Job Description

\xe2\x80\x9cOutside the box. Above the Earth. Beyond our wildest dreams. Our engineers are creating new possibilities in space.\xe2\x80\x9d

We are looking for an experienced Web Developer that has experience with Python 3 programming in a Linux environment.

The successful candidate will be supporting JPL Mars 2020 flight mission developing critical software pertaining to the Engineering Analysis Subsystem (EAS) and the Robotic Planning Subsystem (RPS). The software will be in the critical path for mission surface operations in that it encompasses both the uplink and downlink process, downlink telemetry manipulation, and reporting to uplink interfaces for tactical operations.

Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To
Meet with and work with clients to address mission needs in a timely manner
Lead the development and maintenance of python-based web services to help tactical operations
Facilitate software development and deployment processes
Maintain and implement continuous integration procedures
Implement and automate unit and functional tests

Education / Work Experience

Bachelors' degree in Computer Science or other STEM discipline and minimum of 4 years of experience

Required Skills
At least 4 years of related experience.
Experience in Python3 application software development and scripting in Linux.
Experience in Web programming utilizing HTML5 (binary web sockets, server sent events, cookies/session state management), CSS3, JavaScript (JSON, JQuery, WebGL, Virtual DOMs, e.g., React.js), REST APIs, single page web applications.
Experience with Agile software development and integration tools such as gitHub/gitLab, JIRA, Jenkins.
Experience in Bash scripting to automate tasks in Linux.
Experience with MySQL, PostreSQL, Elasticsearch.
Work Location:
The work will be performed in Pasadena CA

This position requires a U.S. Citizen or U.S. Person who is eligible to obtain any required Export Authorization.

Business Unit Profile
Intelligence, Information and Services delivers innovative technology to make the world a safer place. Our expertise in cyber, analytics and automation allow us to reach beyond what others think is possible to underpin national security and give our global customers unique solutions to solve the most pressing modern challenges -- from the cyber domain to automated operations, and from intelligent transportation and training solutions to creating clear insight from large volumes of data. IIS operates at nearly 550 sites in 80 countries, and is headquartered in Dulles, Virginia. The business area generated $6.2 billion in 2018 revenues. As a global business, our leaders must have the ability to understand, embrace and operate in a multicultural world -- in the marketplace and the workplace. We strive to hire people who reflect our communities and embrace diversity and inclusion to advance our culture, develop our employees, and grow our business.
Business
Intelligence, Information&Svcs

No

Cloud Computing, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Computer/Management Information Systems, Data Science, Software Engineering
Type Of Job
Full Time

None / Not Required

Exempt

Raytheon is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected Veteran status."

Solid OOP and software design knowledge \xe2\x80\x93 you should know how to create software that\xe2\x80\x99s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives.
Experience with dynamic web application development and a willingness to learn new technologies if needed (ideally you have shipped at least one substantial web application and know how to integrate with backend RESTful APIs).
Experience with mobile application development preferred.

Experience With WordPress Preferred

We are committed to diversity. Phyn LLC is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V.

Torrance, California'

title: b'Web Analytics Software Developer Intern'
job description:
b'Job Description

TechStyle Fashion Group is currently seeking a Web Analytics Software Developer to join the Data Analytics team for Summer 2020.

The web analytics software developer intern will join the data analytics team to aide in development, guidance, and direction setting for web and mobile analytics. The right candidate would be a self-motivated, highly detail-oriented team-player with a positive drive to strategize and implement data driven solutions that enable the business to derive valuable insights.

You will join a team of experienced data leaders in developing and integrating a completely new web and mobile analytics solutions to power machine learning algorithms and derive business insights including business strategy, customer experience, and personalization engines. This is an exciting opportunity for anyone interested in pursuing a career in data, providing hands on experience with software development, data engineering, architecture, and big data

What You Will Learn: Interns will gain hands-on experience on:
Leveraging academic knowledge of Javascript in a work environment to create a state of the art web and mobile analytics solution
Implementing, integrating, and maintaining a new customer data platform to power machine learning and business insights
Working with integration developers, product managers, and the data analytics team to produce a web and mobile analytics solution focused on clean data
Partnering with senior architects, product managers, engineering teams, core architecture teams, end business users, and other teams to deliver a robust data services platform
Opportunity to work across technologies and coding languages with experts in React, Kafka, Java, and Javascript to product a leading solution in the analytics space for clean customer data


Qualifications
Graduating in June 2020 or earlier, Preferred majors/minors in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field
Ability to learn quickly and multi-task in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Must be familiar with Javascript with preference for candidates with previous academic or work experience with coding in Javascript
Desire to leverage existing knowledge to gain hands on experience working with software development and complex data structures, including the process to implement a customer data platform that replaces the existing data lay
Analytical thinker with logical structuring skills and ability to communicate thought processes articulately


The Intern Gig: TechStyle Fashion Group is looking for enthusiastic students with ambition to go far. Our internship program will give you a chance to gain in-depth knowledge of what it is like to be a TechStyle Fashion Group employee and to be a part of our fast and innovative company culture. Our summer internship program will last for 9 weeks and start at the beginning of June, with the unique opportunity to gain real work experience, while participating in fun social activities and offsites throughout the duration of the internship assignment.

TechStyle is an Equal Opportunity Employer: M/F/PV/D (minority, female, protected veteran, disability)'

title: b'Junior Graphic Designer, LA'
job description:
b'Overview

Vince Holding Corp. is a global contemporary group, consisting of three brands: Vince, Rebecca Taylor, and Parker. Vince, established in 2002, is a leading global luxury apparel and accessories brand best known for creating California-inspired elevated yet understated pieces for every day effortless style. Known for its range of luxury products, Vince offers women\xe2\x80\x99s and men\xe2\x80\x99s ready-to-wear and accessories through 49 full-price retail stores, 15 outlet stores, and its e-commerce site, vince.com as well as premium wholesale channels globally and through its subscription service, Unfold. Rebecca Taylor, founded in 1996 in New York City, is a high-end women\xe2\x80\x99s contemporary lifestyle brand inspired by beauty in the everyday. The Rebecca Taylor collection is available at Rebecca Taylor boutiques and at rebeccataylor.com as well as high-end department and specialty stores worldwide as well is its subscription service. Parker, founded in 2008 in New York City, is a contemporary women\xe2\x80\x99s fashion brand with high perceived value. The Parker collection is available at parkerny.com as well as high-end department and specialty stores worldwide. Vince Holding Corp. is headquartered in New York. Please visit www.vince.com for more information.

Vince is searching for talent to contribute to the future development of the brand who have passion, creativity, and an entrepreneurial spirit. As a company, we are committed to offering our employees a challenging and rewarding work environment, opportunities for growth and development, a customer focused culture, a community to \xe2\x80\x9cgive-back\xe2\x80\x9d, and competitive pay and benefits.

Position Description

The Junior Graphic Designer will support the creative team to produce high-quality, on brand, print and digital creative. From the production of email blasts to the creation of web assets, this position will play an integral role in creating digital content for the e-commerce site vince.com. Other tasks will include assisting the team with special projects such as: creating event invitations, laying out both print and digital ad placements, and producing PR look books.

THE POSITION

Organizational Structure

The Junior Graphic Designer reports to the Art Director

Responsibilities
Produce production quality digital graphics and typography for print, web, mobile and app.
Work closely with Senior Graphic Designer, Art Director and e-commerce team to maintain the weekly upkeep of vince.com by updating website assets, designing weekly emails, landing page, home page, banners, app assets etc.
Assist the Senior Graphic Designer by taking on special projects, concept and design collateral, and promotional pieces for retail and wholesale such as: store emails, cash wrap displays and in-store signage, look books, light boxes, packaging, hang tag labels, brand books, evites
Use guidelines to layout ad placements
Work directly with marketing coordinator and digital marketing manager on delivery of assets for resizes, evites, affiliate advertising and display channels
Work closely with web developer to expand creative and come up with new and innovative ideas for vince.com
Keep in touch with market trends, competitive landscape performance, and future concepts that could be applied to the brand creative
Qualifications/Experience
BFA in Graphic Design or similar discipline
Must have at least 1 year of graphic experience including e-commerce, experiential design and apparel online branding. Experience designing for luxury brands is a major plus.
Must have advanced knowledge of Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign (knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus)
Demonstrated understanding of website usability/web optimization best practices
Exceptional typographical skills and meticulous attention to detail
Ability to multitask and fulfill multiple project requests while meeting development deadlines
Well versed in all social media and existing/emerging platforms
Thorough experience designing for the web (e-commerce, emails, online branding)
Strong communication and project management skills
Self-motivated, efficient and capable of working collaboratively across multiple teams
The ability to embrace constructive feedback Good design research skills
Compensation

The successful candidate will enjoy a competitive compensation package which may include short and/or long term incentives, clothing allowance, and merchandise discount, in addition to base salary and full health and welfare benefits.

Vince, LLC is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant or employee because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, age, or military or veteran status or any other status protected by applicable federal, state or local law. Vince, LLC also provides reasonable accommodation to qualified individuals with disabilities in accordance with applicable laws.'

title: b'Jr. Web Developer'
job description:
b"This entry-level position was created to provide additional technological support to the web-based technology operations of the University. This position will interact directly with internal customers to understand software requirements, create proof-of-concepts and build production-quality programming code. The Jr. Developer will use their skills with HTML, CSS, to support our web platforms across the university.

This position supports the University\xe2\x80\x99s mission by developing websites that promote our brand to our major audiences as well as creating functionality that drives some of our essential recruitment and alumni systems via the web. Our IMC team and this Jr. Web Developer position align our entire approach for marketing and communications around the mission and strategic goals. Major systems and initiatives involving this position include web redesign, web server administration, mobile and email.

Duties
Back-End Coding & Development - Develop/implement web applications and code using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery knowledge on University Websites and digital initiatives.
Web Application Development & Management - Oversee the administration of Pepperdine's online event calendar, digital newsroom, and search engine.
Core Web Platforms - Serve as secondary support/administrator for core web platforms including web servers, drupal cms, web databases, and Wordpress.
Customer / Constituent Support - Troubleshoot and provide innovative solutions for digital initiatives.
Reporting & Analytics - Create, synthesize, and distribute performance reports for imc digital marketing projects.
Documentation & Training - Document IMC digital marketing processes, best practices, and provide training as needed.
Communications - Promote system and best practice adoption. Advocate for Pepperdine's core digital marketing platforms.
Stay current with industry trends and inform other stakeholders on required changes.
Perform other duties as assigned.
Uphold University mission through work performed.

The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities, and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job.

Skills And Qualifications

Required: Bachelor's degree; Two-plus years of experience in Web design and development using HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery and SEO best practices; One year of experience with version control and deployment using Git and Node.js and Grunt frameworks; LESS/SASS, jQuery/Ember.js across the enterprise for web, mobile, and email; HTML/ CSS/Photoshop for development and site production (hand code) required; Working knowledge JavaScript/XSL/PHP for development and site production a Plus+; Familiar with analytics, adwords, tracking software, SEO and fundamental web marketing concepts; Ability to lead small development projects, discuss project requirements with vendors, and to meet time sensitive deadlines. The ability to work independently and timely is a must. Proficient using Development tools such as; Dreamweaver, Sublime, or Textwrangler. Proficient in Google Webmaster tools.Proficient in Web Analytics tools such as Google Analytics. Mac and PC proficient

Preferred: Excellent project management and prioritization skills and ability to align efforts across multiple departments. Good understanding of web development and design as it pertains to search engine optimization. Very strong organization, problem solving, and interpersonal skills. Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft and Google suites, Slack.

Qualified individuals should be able to articulate a strong commitment to diversity, and have the ability to work effectively with individuals from different backgrounds. Qualified applicants with criminal histories will be considered for employment in compliance with all applicable laws.

Offers of employment are contingent upon successful completion of a criminal, education, and employment screening.

This is a regular, nonexempt, 40 hour per week position.

Salary: Commensurate with experience"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Must be able to work on Apex W2 without sponsorship

Position: Front-End Developer

Location: Santa Ana, CA

Length: 6 months +

Duties

As a front-end software development engineer on the team, you will translate concepts and business requirements in user flows, wireframes, mock-ups and prototypes that lead to an intuitive user experience. You will work closely with product owner and stake holder to gain clear understanding of product vision and requirements. You will also provide strategic design and user-experience recommendations based on the core features and new features of our products. You will collaborate with scrum team to accomplish business goals.

The Ideal Candidate Is
Passionate about new opportunities and has a demonstrated track record of success in delivering new features and products.
A commitment to teamwork, hustle, and strong communication skills to both business and technical partners are absolute requirements.
This person has thrived and succeeded in delivering high quality technology products/services and will flourish in an environment where new opportunities and challenges arise frequently.
We seek a great team player who will naturally elevate the performance of the people around them.
High collaboration with Product and Design are imperative.
The ability to build productive relationships with colleagues and customers will make you successful in this role.


Skills
4+ years of previous professional UX design experience.
Ability to prototype UI with CSS, HTML, JSON and React.
Experience as a designer working closely with development teams in an agile environment.
Familiarity with design patterns, user experience guidelines and best practices for all platform product experiences.
Excellent communication, problem-solving, facilitation, presentation, and interpersonal skills
Capability to identify design problems and provide quality solutions.
Ability to work independently with limited supervision.
Ability to quickly learn and stay current with modern design trends and techniques
Strong interpersonal skills, with excellent written and verbal communication
Rigorous focus on security at all levels of the application, a "shift left" mentality


Education
BA/BS degree in the field of Design or Computer Science.

If interested send your resume in MS Word format to DTANG@APEXSYSTEMS.COM
